sentences.english: Hasty Hearth Reduces the cooldown on your Hearthstone by 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 急速爐石你的爐石的冷卻時間減少15分鐘。

sentences.english: Steroids soared in popularity among high school students.
sentences.chinese: 固醇類藥物在高中生中的受歡迎程度急速串升。

sentences.english: But forecasters predict that temperatures will soar to 28C.
sentences.chinese: 但天氣預報預測，近期溫度將急速上升至28攝氏度。

sentences.english: A weather front is blowing in, and his thick wool cape flutters behind him.
sentences.chinese: 山風呼嘯，他那厚重的羊毛披肩往身後急速的擺盪。

sentences.english: For their feet run to evil, and make haste to shed blood.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他們的腳奔跑行惡，他們急速流人的血。

sentences.english: The languages of Denmark and Norway both have similar words. The words mean to fall suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 丹麥和挪威語中都有類似的單詞，意思是急速跌落。

sentences.english: The chairman was rushed to the hospital after collapsing with heart trouble.
sentences.chinese: 王先生因心臟病昏倒後，被急速送往醫院。

sentences.english: The instinctive response to being approached rapidly is to freeze.
sentences.chinese: 當有東西急速靠近時人的本能反應是馬上站立不動。

sentences.english: Due to excellent poleward outflow, NARI intensified at greater than climatological rate last night.
sentences.chinese: 受到極好的極向輻散通道影響，百合在昨晚急速增強。

sentences.english: When he dashed back, he was already out of breath.
sentences.chinese: 當他急速跑回來時，他已經是上氣不接下氣了。

sentences.english: Barrick’s shares fell sharply after the bid was revealed.
sentences.chinese: 當標的價被公開後，巴里克股價急速下跌。

sentences.english: The car pelted along,with two motorcycles running after.
sentences.chinese: 那輛汽車急速行駛，兩輛摩托車緊跟其後。

sentences.english: They rushed more troops to the front.
sentences.chinese: 他們急速調派了更多的部隊奔赴前線。

sentences.english: Quick wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim.
sentences.chinese: 急速狂吹的西風激怒了魯莽的吉姆。

sentences.english: The temperature plummets in winter and soars in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 冬天氣溫急速變冷夏日則是過於炎熱。

definition: to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
to press on towards/to close in on/to approach/to draw near
